text: I normally start with some story boarding and then make an animatic, and dreamt thatâ€™s I was lost in China and got on a bus which was actually a shop owned by a little elderly couple. There tables covered in baskets of food and trinkets and cooked ducks hanging from the over-head handrails. The bus began to move and I was trying to ask for directions but was being thrown around and juggling baskets as the bus took sharp turns :joy: it was very interesting so I decided to turn it into an animation
